column1: 399918,Fire Protection Equipment Technician,,"Test fire protection equipment and systems
column3: Inspect equipment to ensure safety or proper functioning
column5: Advise others on issues related to repairs, installation or equipment design
column7: Maintain equipment or systems to ensure proper functioning
column9: Install fire protection equipment and systems
column11: Communicate with co-workers to coordinate installations or repairs
column13: Safely move and store dangerous goods
column17: Locate fires or fire danger areas
column19: Analyse risks to minimise losses or damages
column21: Inspect facilities to ensure compliance with fire regulations
column23: Maintain knowledge of current developments in area of expertise
column25: Repair worn, damaged, or defective mechanical parts
column31: Confer with customers or users to assess problems
